metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2938 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel's implementation of Pressure StallInformation. While the feature is disabled by default, it could allow anattacker to crash the system or have other memory-corruption side effects.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
